content: Has anybody gotten this set up and working well?
I am just using vscode/RA with the Miri folder. It "works" for Miri stuff, but I think RA doesn't have any semantic information about librustc*.
You can set rust-analyzer.rustcSource for it to analyze the rustc_* crates.

bjorn3 said:

You can set rust-analyzer.rustcSource for it to analyze the rustc_* crates.

which path does one have to set here? I keep getting an error saying "the manifest path must be a path to a Cargo.toml file". I tried /home/r/.rustup/toolchains/miri/lib/rustlib/rustc-src/rust/compiler/ and there seems to be noCargo.toml anywhere near that place.
Well, there are Cargo.toml for each of the crates, but then which crate should I point it to? That doesn't seem to make much sense.
